p: For dengue, we analyze monthly aggregated dengue case count data from five countries/states: 3 in Asia (Singapore, Taiwan, and Thailand) and 2 in South America (Brazil and Mexico). This is combined with the top ten queries that were most highly correlated with the term ‘dengue’ in each country [ 43] using Google Trends data. For each country, the monthly aggregated search fractions of these terms [ 43] were then used. In the case of ILI, we used weekly ILI case count data from the United States. This is combined with electronic health records and Google Trends data [ 44].
